order: You can check your order status by logging into your account and clicking 'My Orders'.
where is my order: You can check your order status by logging into your account and clicking 'My Orders'.
return: Our return policy allows returns within 30 days of purchase with a valid receipt.
shipping: Shipping usually takes 3-5 business days. You can track your order using the tracking number.
thank you: You're welcome! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask.
cancel order: You can cancel an order within 24 hours of placing it by going to 'My Orders' and selecting 'Cancel Order'.
payment options: We accept credit/debit cards, net banking, UPI, and popular wallets for payment.
discounts: We regularly offer discounts and promotions. Check our 'Offers' section for current deals.
change address: You can update your shipping address before the order is dispatched from 'My Account' > 'Address Book'.
track shipment: Once your order is shipped, you will receive a tracking number via email or SMS. Use it to track your shipment.
product warranty: Most products come with a manufacturer warranty. Check the product details page for exact warranty information.
out of stock: If a product is out of stock, you can sign up for a notification on the product page to be alerted when it's available again.
contact support: You can reach our customer support via chat, email, or phone. Click on 'Contact Us' for details.
